thread.title: Nicki Minaj Hints Paris Fashion Week Outfit Was More Picasso & Less Lil Kim
thread.title_full: Nicki Minaj Hints Paris Fashion Week Outfit Was More Picasso & Less Lil Kim

author: D.L. Chandler
title: Nicki Minaj Hints Paris Fashion Week Outfit Was More Picasso & Less Lil Kim
text:
11 
Paris, France ‚Äì The bold, bare-breasted outfit Nicki Minaj wore to Paris Fashion Week over the weekend drew immediate comparisons to Lil Kim ‚Äòs similar bold, bare-breasted 1999 MTV Video Music Awards ensemble, and to a lesser extent, Janet Jackson‚Äôs infamous wardrobe malfunction at Super Bowl 38 in 2004. But the Queens star took to Instagram on Sunday and hinted that the inspiration for the outfit was only famed artist Pablo Picasso. 
The ‚ÄúSHETHER‚Äù target was front row at Haider Ackermann‚Äôs AW18 show on Saturday with a black jacket showcasing her exposed left breast, with the nipple covered by a pasty. Once the outfit started drawing attention (and comparisons to her Brooklyn rival), Minaj posted an image of Picasso‚Äôs La Femme √† l‚Äô√âventail painting to IG, which features a female subject with her left breast exposed. 
The reaction on social media was swift with many showing side-by-side comparison photos of the outfits showing the similarities. While Kim‚Äôs outfit was an actual dress and brighter in appearance with glitter, Minaj‚Äôs look was starker and paired with leather shorts. 
Even with Minaj noting the inspiration behind the fashion choice, there were still some skeptics (largely among Lil Kim fans). Barbz: Nicki Minaj's pasty was inspired by Picasso 
‚Äî Kimmy Blanco (@LilKimRoyal) March 5, 2017 
Read on for more reaction to Nicki Minaj‚Äôs Picasso-inspired Paris Fashion Week outfit. A post shared by Nicki Minaj (@nickiminaj) on Mar 5, 2017 at 8:01am PST üëë 
Visual de @NICKIMINAJ hoje (04) na #ParisFashionWeek foi inspirado na obra Le Femme (1907) de Pablo Picasso. pic.twitter.com/IPZxmSYt4G
